content: an interesting lark s foot pattern pairs up with soft self-striping yarn to create this divine crochet throw caron cloud cakes is light and fluffy so working with it is a dream since the yarn changes color for you simply focus on doing the required chain double_crochet and extended double_crochet techniques to complete your project the pattern adapts to any color that matches your space so you can easily enhance your décor with this cozy accessory yarn for model caron® cloud cakes™ 8 5 oz/240 g 760 yds/695 m shark skin 19017 3 cakes
